title: [b]Move Art[/b]
desc:
Moves art file into a /finished/ folder after it has been used to render an image.
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]CRT Filter[/b]
desc:
Apply a CRT style filter to the final render.
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Inverted Mana[/b]
desc:
Invert the colors of the mana symbols, may be a little easier to read.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Symbol Background[/b]
desc:
Turn on or off the background to symbols.
[b](Default: False)[/b]
